assessments.status_rationale: The shutdown window (2026-02-01 to 2026-03-15) has not started yet. Today’s news notes Democrats are considering a shutdown fight, but there is no confirmed lapse in appropriations or 24+ hour shutdown reported.
No information in today’s bullets about LBMA spot gold closing at/above $5,200, and the deadline (2026-03-31) is still in the future.
Today’s bullets do not mention any Apple announcement or Apple Newsroom/keynote confirmation of Siri integrating Google Gemini. Deadline (2026-02-28) remains ahead.
No market-close 10-year Treasury yield level is provided in today’s bullets, and the deadline (2026-04-30) is still ahead.

While there is reporting on Iran and U.S./regional tensions, there is no evidence in today’s bullets of the EU adopting a new Iran human-rights sanctions action adding 5+ new listings. Deadline (2026-03-31) is in the future.

No reporting in today’s bullets indicates China has announced removal/suspension/investigation of an additional senior PLA official at the specified seniority levels. Deadline (2026-06-30) is in the future.

Today’s bullets describe a major winter storm and disruptions, but do not show any of the named airlines disclosing a quantified Q1 2026 weather-related impact of at least $200M. Deadline (2026-05-15) is in the future.

There is extensive coverage of the Minneapolis killing incident and political response, but no bullet indicates DOJ has publicly confirmed opening a federal investigation related to the incident. Deadline (2026-02-28) remains ahead.
